The quality of this sweater is great and the price was excellent! The material is thick and the buttons are beautiful.
This is a great sweater for the price Not a real lightweight but just right for winter or heading into spring.
Good

Perfect for work. Fits great.
Bought a small in the black/white striped for a job interview and it was perfect! Great quality and gives that old money classy look. Cant beat it for the price! For reference, I am 5'5 146 lbs
Quality was decent but the color was off.
Good quality, very soft. I liked it!
Love this sweater.  Always get compliments when I wear it.  It's cropped and the color is more of a pinkish tan.
I love the buttons on this, but it is a little boxier than I was anticipating. Great weight!
I liked the color and fit. However, the sweater knit looked very cheap and so did the buttons. I’m keeping it, knowing that I will have to be super careful to avoid getting snags.
This sweater is beautiful!  Fits perfectly and so soft.  Love it!  I definitely recommend it!
Good material and very elegant look. it is a steal with the price I paid. I ordered more of different colors. highly recommend.
Loved the sweater. Made very well. Would buy again.
Too large for 105 lb frame
This is a very attractive sweater and adds a touch of class to a dress, pants and top or skirt and top. It fits well. I was pleased to get it on sale. I bought another in another color.

Beautiful sweater. Fine knit, thicker material than I expected for the price. The buttons are nice. The sweater has plenty of room for movement. Attractive buttoned or unbuttoned. I will order other colors.

Pleasantly surprising that this jacket is NOT flimsy or ill-fitting. I got the black/white striped and it will go with many outfits. The only problem are the too small button holes. I’m worried they may fray if I force the buttons through, but for the price, I’ll learn to live with that. I’m 5’5”, 210 lbs, and the XL fits perfectly
Love this cardigan! Good quality and exactly as pictured.

I was a little skeptical about buying this cardigan because of the low price, but now I want one in every color!! Heavy weight, fine knit, super soft, but with structure. Buttons are high quality, and even come with an extra. Fit is comfortably loose, but hits waist nicely. Blown away by value!!
Cardigan is good quality. It is a thicker material. It does run small. I typically wear an XL at Old Navy for reference and this was too small when buttoned.
Adding this to my old-money outfit styles.

评论详情: After I received the first one, I ordered it in three more colors!  This is such a versatile wardrobe piece!  Goes with so many things.  Perfect with skirts, jeans, slacks, tights!  A wardrobe blessing!
The sweater appears to be well made.  It was well packaged and is not cheap looking.
Nice thickness and quality and lovely look.  Runs a little large.
Very thick nice material. Bought for a trip but have continued to wear it as business wear.
Bought this sweater for my sister, who is picky.  It's more of my style, conservative, but she loves it!  Yoo Hoo!
Super nice fabric and construction. Boxy fit. I'm usually an extra small in tops, but ordered small. Super adorable unbuttoned with tank underneath.
This sweater is stylish and elegant but pills easily. To avoid this, dry cleaning is recommended but is not cost effective.
I loved the color and fit...however, the fabric was too stiff and scratchy.
It shrinked after washing
Runs small and short.

Warm and comfortable. After the first wash it was matted and needed a sweater shaver, not sure how long it will last. Buttons aren't great quality. Nice design, but too bad it is not made from natural fibers.

This is the third cardigan I purchase from this line and will purchase a black one soon.  Not sure how they will launder but I plan on having them dry-cleaned.  The fit for me..small..is perfect and why pay over $100 for a similar look?  which I have seen in 2 high end department stores and online shops.  Good for all seasons depending on the weather..easy to style..elevated look.
This is the most amazing beautiful sweater. It’s great for layering, but it is thick and pretty, and the gold button detail makes it look high fashion.

评论概述: It’s beautifully made for the price point
评论详情: I love the fit, buttons and style of it. It is well made an surprisingly the material is good. I got it on sale and will definitely buy another if the price is right again
I get so many compliments on this sweater! Super comfortable material, so soft and looks more expensive than it is. I usually wear a large and that’s what I bought and it fits great.  Love it!
Sweater is soft. Nice material. Hate the gold buttons, super cheap looking. I replaced with basic black buttons.

I realize I really appreciate when I can see reviews with pics on here especially if there’s not a high volume of reviews so here we are. I bought this specifically to layer for an upcoming trip where weather is unpredictable. It fit great under the jacket. Clearly won’t wear with pj shorts but for those trying to gauge fit and body type, I am 5’5 at 197lb and I ordered the XL. I am a smaller chest 38 b/c and I can tell wearing with a padded bra or larger chest it would gape at top but could easily unbutton top button. VERY soft, not itchy. Definitely recommend.
The fabric is thick but not very soft.  The buttonholes are not finished.  There are a lot of loose threads.  Pockets are not real; just a piece of fabric sewn on the garment.  Not sure I will keep.

评论概述: The softest, most elegant sweater around
评论详情: The look of this sweater is so classy and elegant. I have seen a sweater very similar to this at Talbots with a price tag of over $90.  The material of this sweater is incredibly soft and stylish. I didn’t want to take it off when I got home from teaching all day. The bright gold buttons have a kings crown engraved on them.  The pockets are challenging to see in the photograph unless you enlarge it; however, they are just the right size for lipstick and a set of keys if you prefer to place those items inside.  I received numerous compliments from both teachers and students.  I saw this truly identical sweater a few weeks ago and put it in my Amazon cart at a price of $49.55. A few days later, I found the exact same sweater and the only difference was the tag brand inside the sweater. I placed this one in my cart and it was actually on sale for $20. I have noticed the price has gone up $4-5 so far. Even with that price tag, this sweater is an incredible steal.  The size is perfect for me. I wish another color was in stock at the same time when I purchased this one, and then I would have bought two.  I washed it on a delicate cycle, dried for 10 minutes with a couple of other delicate clothing items, and then hung it to completely dry. I do not want to take a chance of getting fuzz balls on this incredibly classy piece of clothing. If I could give this sweater 10 stars, I definitely would not hesitate!
Great quality, thick and comfortable but runs large. I’m typically a large/xl and need a medium in this sweater.
Very very nice. Fit is true to size.
Disliked the material.
Color was slightly off, not exactly as expected.
The fit (medium) 2 was as expected,. I liked it so much I bought another to give as a gift.
Super comfortable and looks more expensive than it is. Fits great size med.
Big chest girls you can wear this one as a button up or an open cardigan. It’s not too big, not too small it’s just right!
Would highly recommend. Classic look and very soft. Fits well and works great with high waisted trousers. Buttons could be sewn on a little more solidly, but otherwise highly recommend.
Substantial knit, nice attention to details like the buttons, great cropped length
Can pair it up with any outfit!

Nice fabric comfy warm sweater.  Looks good. Only negative is the space between the buttons opens up so when buttoned must wear a cami under.  Being the fabric is heavy a cami under could be hot to wear.
What a pleasant surprise to receive this sweater. The quality and feel was way better than I anticipated. Would not hesitate to order again and recommend.
True to size. Great quality.
Cute but a lil “boxy” in shape!

This was such a good buy. It’s heavy, and feels much more expensive than it is. The material is comfy & not itchy at all. And most of all… it isn’t cropped!!! I can’t tell you how refreshing it is to find a jacket that’s not cropped or way too long.
Very nice sweater, well made and soft. This is a high quality sweater and it comes with an extra button as well. Definitely a top purchase on Amazon!
I’m really impressed with the quality,  also bought one for my daughter
Color was a light egg shell. It was a little bit larger than medium. The sweater is substantial and nicely made.

评论概述: It is soft - but one of the buttons fell off
评论详情: I got this for me - but I thought the buttons made it look kind of cheap.  Surprisingly my tween daughter took it over.  She liked that it was over-sized on her.  And she likes how soft it is.  Unfortunately, after 2 washes, one of the buttons fell off - which is a shame....  All the rest of the buttons are secure....
Thicker than I thought! Seems to run large
Nice sweater, but the buttons look really cheap
It is well made, good lines, perfect for winter outfits.
Great layering piece loved the feel. Would buy another color for sure!
Arrived just on time.  The color is like anything I ever saw, beige with a hint of pink.  Real soft fils like cashmere
Soft soft thick material

I was not sure what to expect for the price of this sweater, but I was very pleasantly surprised. It is very soft and of a good weight. The style is very nice, similar to higher priced “lady jackets” I see.  I am very satisfied with my purchase!

I bought this in the camel/khaki color and also purchased the J crew Emilee lady jacket. The color is a little more pinkish than the j crew version but let me tell you… THIS is the winner! It’s a couple inches longer, which I appreciate as I’m 5’8”, size 12-14, 40DD. The Large is comparable to the XL J crew. It’s SO SOFT and a fraction of the price. Does run a size big, as other reviews stated. I actually think the fit on this one is more flattering than the expensive one. It’s  more comfortable and not so thick and stiff but still looks nice, not sloppy or too unstructured (unless you order your regular size or size up). Came back to order the black and maybe the striped one too. Love!

When I initially put the sweater on I was impressed. It felt comfortable and well made. Well, I pulled up my sleeve to look at my apple watch to tell the time and the sleeve ripped at the seam so easily (see photo). I had been wearing the sweater for about 20 minutes at this point. If it is going to rip so easily this sweater should cost $5. Very disappointing
I really was looking forward to receiving this, but it arrived stained!
This cardigan has better quality than expected. I probably could’ve sized down, but the xl will do.
Very nice and soft

This is one of my daughter’s favorite tops! She loves the material and says it’s really easy to wash. The black and white are very vivid. It’s super-soft and she wears it all the time. She loves wearing it year-round as it’s not too heavy or too light.

This incredible, elegant cardigan jacket is soft, chic & fits as expected. It fits close to the body without it being too tight or too boxy. It has two pockets, gold buttons & comes with an extra button. I highly recommend this product.
The open front design, coupled with long sleeves and a button-down closure, makes for a versatile and chic look. The knit fabric feels cozy, and the cropped length adds a trendy touch.
Love this. Looks classy and is so soft.
Flattering style, not too cropped, great fit, soft and comfortable, smooth feel. Short waisted so fit is perfect. Can be styled with different clothes. Absolutely ❤️

I am 5’3” and 140 lbs.  I ordered the cardigan in size medium, and it fit great. The sweater material is medium weight and it could be worn as a sweater jacket in cooler temperatures with a short or long sleeve t-shirt underneath.  The gold buttons are a nice detail, and the sweater can either be dressed up with black pants/slacks or dressed down with jeans.  I am very happy with it and will be ordering another one in a different color.  Would recommend!

I got small and there is plenty room under armpit and bust. It is not running big it is originally designed to be like that. And this design makes so comfy to move your arms. The quality is excellent. It is thick and the weave is tight like a expensive sweater. It is not cheap looking sweater that your hand is visible through the holes. It is soft and warm enough for fall and winter.
A very soft sweat but unfortunately, the brown color looks more warm pink. I am returning this.

Nice slight crop and gold buttons give this a timeless look.  I bought the large based on other reviews.  I wear a 14-16 top and it fits nicely but not generously.  If I'd gone up to xl, I think it would have looked sloppy and just too big.  I also like the pockets; the fabric is a little delicate.  I bought the black and am very happy with my purchase.
Based on sizing chart and my other similar sweater I ordered a M and it is big and boxy! I wanted a more  fitted look. Keep that in mind when ordering. Item looks like picture. Nice preppy sweater.
This cardigan looks exactly like the picture, the comfiest material, so soft 😍. I love the gold buttons detail. Looks beautiful. Very good quality. 10/10

This looks very rich. The fabric is so soft. The buttons look expensive and do not look cheap. Very well constructed. Mine did appear to have a small snag but it doesn't take away from the appearance. It is not super heavy so you could probably wear this all year round. Definitely recommend this. For size, I'm 5'6" 195lbs and purchased a large.It buttons on my size, and feels comfortable, but there was a small gap at the bottom. I probably could have gotten a XL but I'm losing weight so I did not want it to be too big.

It's bulky and warm, and neutral colored. She looks like a librarian when she wears it, but she says I look like Mr. Rogers when I wear my cardigan.  We're at the age where cardigans start making sense.
This cardigan is comfortable. It fits nicely. I’m not a fan of the gold buttons. It would look better if they were silver or black. The material is not too hot. I like that it has pockets.
I was pleased with this purchase. It was better than I expected for the price
